Text: Thanks.  I've been waiting for this for a long time.  By any chance, does someone have the recording with the female voice?  Believe it or not her surname was Reader.  She gives another slant to this great book.  Wonder what the Chinese today think of it.

@saluqi - thanks for the feedback, always appreciated.

ahh, found what you're looking for:
 > Read by Kate Reading / Books On Tape, p2001. 9780736685146.
she is a great reader.

stay tuned - maybe I'll post that one too.

(other recording: - Read by Anthony Heald / Blackstone Audiobooks, 2007)

There are two additional titles in this trilogy: "Sons" and "A House Divided"  Should you ever locate them as audio books, the upload would be  greatly appreciated.  

Thank You for this version of The Good Earth as narrated by George Guidall.   He's one of the best so I'm sure this will be an excellent rendition of a classic

@neshaminy: 
  I haven't seen Pearl S Buck's other books in audio - Recorded Books, Books On Tape, Brilliance, Harper, Hachette, Random House, S&S, etc - none seem to have done them. Too bad. 
If anyone finds info on those, let us know.

Thanks for the feedback.
Thanks to the seeders.

Nice "rarity" I meant to read for years. Greatly packaged and presented. 

Thank you. :)

Have also posted this book read by Kate Reading.
Which do you prefer?
